mapper.update: update route set city_id = #{cityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, province_id = #{provinceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, route_name = #{routeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_province = #{startProvince,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_city = #{startCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, end_province = #{endProvince,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, end_city = #{endCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mid_province = #{midProvince,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mid_city = #{midCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tran_sport_price = #{tranSportPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, Comment = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where route_id = #{routeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select route_id, city_id, province_id, route_name, start_province, start_city, end_province, end_city, mid_province, mid_city, tran_sport_price, Comment from route where route_id = #{routeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select route_id, city_id, province_id, route_name, start_province, start_city, end_province, end_city, mid_province, mid_city, tran_sport_price, Comment from route
